bucket_name.info: Enter the name of the bucket.

strategy.info: Choose the strategy to upload the file. Store Data means that the source file is parsed and stored as LangFlow data. Store Original File means that the source file is uploaded as is.

success.files_processed_by_data: Successfully uploaded {uploaded} files by data, skipped {skipped}
success.files_processed_by_name: Successfully uploaded {uploaded} files by name, skipped {skipped}

warnings.missing_data: Missing file path or text content for file: {path}
warnings.no_file_path: No file path provided in data item

errors.upload_data_failed: Failed to upload data for file {path}: {error}
errors.process_by_data_failed: Failed to process files by data: {error}
errors.process_by_name_failed: Failed to process files by name: {error}
errors.boto3_not_installed: boto3 is not installed. Please install it using `uv pip install boto3`.

logs.uploading_data: Uploading data from {path} to S3 key: {key}
logs.data_uploaded: Data uploaded successfully to S3 key: {key}
logs.file_uploaded: File uploaded successfully to S3 key: {key}
